summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Kilos/Litros feature - both backend APIs and frontend UI tested successfully. All features working correctly.

issues: Minor React hydration warning in console: span cannot be child of tbody - this is a structural HTML issue in table rendering but doesn't affect functionality

passed_tests: Navigate to Hub Puerta Toledo -> Kilos/Litros section
Monthly summary cards display correct totals (Clientes, Kilos, Litros, Bultos)
Add new entry with route, repartidor, clientes, kilos, litros, bultos
New entry appears in day's records table
Por Repartidor tab shows employee summary with correct aggregation
Por Ruta tab shows route summary with all 3 routes (005, 103, 143)
Historial del Mes tab shows all entries with dates and day names
Export CSV functionality - downloads file with correct filename
Delete entry - removes entry and updates summary totals
Summary totals update in real-time after add/delete operations
critical_code_review_comments: Minor: React hydration warning for table structure - span used as wrapper inside tbody. Consider using React.Fragment or restructuring the map iteration
seed_data_creation: Existing seed data: gabriel entry on route 005 with 15 clientes, 120.50 kilos, 45.20 litros, 10 bultos
context_for_next_testing_agent: Kilos/Litros feature fully implemented and working. Three routes exist (005, 103, 143). One sample entry exists for gabriel. All CRUD operations verified. CSV export working. All tabs (Registro Diario, Por Repartidor, Por Ruta, Historial del Mes) functional.

features_tested.monthly_summary_cards: ✓ Working - shows Clientes, Kilos, Litros, Bultos totals
